name: Merge Planes
description:
Ever wanted to be a captain? Ever wanted to be an air giant? Take control of your very own parking apron and airline.

Make your plane team become the biggest one in the world!

Play the best plane game on your mobile device!

Merge Planes has a very simple gameplay: buy, merge and manage your planes, so you can earn gold and unlock 12 real life models.

Merge Plane Feature

•Merge plane to upgrade and fly to earn money.

•Variety of planes. There are more than 12 kinds of planes in the game. And some rare planes are waiting for you to collect.

•Idle system. Your planes fly automatically. You can get money even when you are offline.


Start your airline empire today!
